section.title: Managing access to company emailPDM_access_policies_home_page
section.para: An email access policy lets you control if and how users can access company email on their devices. You can apply only one email access policy to a group. You can configure the policy to deny access to company email from a device that is not in a secure state.

To create an email access policy, you need to select appropriate policy components and configure associated settings. The components and their settings are configured based on the security goals and requirements of your organization.
